title: Whatever I earn, I gift it to my mom but it is still in MY account, who pays Zakat on it me or her?
transcript: Tevin da from India yeah my question is regarding Jakarta actually whatever I earned I gifted to my mom my mother I said that it is your money but it is still in my account and I can use some of it like if I have 200 I can use 5 to 10. so if the card payable on me and or her and uh in this that's that's that's one question devender thank you very much I don't take more than one question and the time is almost up see a gift is not a gift until it is possessed by the one given to So when you say to your mom I've given you my salary and it's in my bank account this is not a gift it has to be physically given to her or transferred to her bank account so it's you're still eligible to give zakat on your bank account and Allah Knows Best foreign [Music] have you ever taken a counseling session with me go to my website and you will find counseling sessions and apply for one if you can afford it that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled for one free session and this is for everybody if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot afford it because they're poor I'll give them one free session without a problem a full half an hour so come to me and let's speak about it inshallah within the following two days or three days and the evening I will uh try and seek Allah's guidance to solve the problem once and for Allah
